node.doctext:
BAP is the Boston Alcohol Posse
[Kill only the stragglers. Let the strong ones live.]

We're [the boston alcohol posse is decadent and depraved|decadent and depraved] yet [the bap is organized|organized]. We [Let Your Liver Do the Walking: An E2 Boston Hangover in the Works|sever heads] and run [the fellatio barn]. We pity the [Wonkoalition], mock your [Let Your Liver Do the Walking: An E2 Boston Hangover in the Works|measly hangovers], and [Humiliating Dump Truck Full of Manure Hazing Ritual|humiliate you with dump truck hazing rituals]. We get [I'M GUNNA BE WICKED RETAHDED: Come for the scenery, stay for the BAP (another E2 nodah pahty)|wicked retahded].


Our mascot:
The ghastly radiant severed head of [donfreenut]
(Medical researchers: Please note advanced
cyanosis due to lopsided lung/bong ratio)
photo by [panamaus]

Please refer to the [E2 Clique Application Form] and [The Everything People Registry : United States : Massachusetts] for more information.
node.title: BAP
